00038 const char *Hyperspace::Protocol::command_strs[COMMAND_MAX] = {
00039   "keepalive",
00040   "handshake",
00041   "open",
00042   "stat",
00043   "cancel",
00044   "close",
00045   "poison",

00059 
00063 const char *Hyperspace::Protocol::command_text(short command) {
00064   if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00065     return "UNKNOWN";
00066   return command_strs[command];
00067 }

00072 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(uint64_t session_id, uint64_t last_known_event, bool shutdown) {
00073   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00074   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 19);
00075   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_KEEPALIVE);
00076   cbuf->append_i64(session_id);
00077   cbuf->append_i64(last_known_event);
00078   cbuf->append_bool(shutdown);
00079   return cbuf;
00080 }

00086 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(uint64_t session_id, int error) {
00087   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00088   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 18);
00089   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_KEEPALIVE);
00090   cbuf->append_i64(session_id);
00091   cbuf->append_i32(error);
00092   cbuf->append_i32(0);
00093   return cbuf;
00094 }

00100 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(SessionDataPtr &session_data) {
00101   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(session_data->mutex);
00102   CommBuf *cbuf = 0;
00103   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00104   uint32_t len = 18;
00105   list<Notification *>::iterator iter;
00106 
00107   for (iter = session_data->notifications.begin(); iter != session_data->notifications.end(); iter++) {
00108     len += 8;  // handle
00109     len += (*iter)->event_ptr->encoded_length();
00110   }
00111 
00112   cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, len);
00113   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_KEEPALIVE);
00114   cbuf->append_i64(session_data->id);
00115   cbuf->append_i32(Error::OK);
00116   cbuf->append_i32(session_data->notifications.size());
00117   for (iter = session_data->notifications.begin(); iter != session_data->notifications.end(); iter++) {
00118     cbuf->append_i64((*iter)->handle);
00119     (*iter)->event_ptr->encode(cbuf);
00124   }
00125 
00126   return cbuf;
00127 }

00133 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_handshake_request(uint64_t session_id) {
00134   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00135   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 10);
00136   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_HANDSHAKE);
00137   cbuf->append_i64(session_id);
00138   return cbuf;
00139 }

00145 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_open_request(const std::string &name, uint32_t flags, HandleCallbackPtr &callback, std::vector<Attribute> &init_attrs) {
00146   size_t len = 14 + encoded_length_vstr(name.size());
00147   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, filename_to_group(name));
00148   for (size_t i=0; i<init_attrs.size(); i++)
00149     len += encoded_length_vstr(name.size()) + encoded_length_vstr(init_attrs[i].value_len);
00150 
00151   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, len);
00152 
00153   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_OPEN);
00154   cbuf->append_i32(flags);
00155   if (callback)
00156     cbuf->append_i32(callback->get_event_mask());
00157   else
00158     cbuf->append_i32(0);
00159   cbuf->append_vstr(name);
00160 
00161   // append initial attributes
00162   cbuf->append_i32(init_attrs.size());
00163   for (size_t i=0; i<init_attrs.size(); i++) {
00164     cbuf->append_vstr(init_attrs[i].name);
00165     cbuf->append_vstr(init_attrs[i].value, init_attrs[i].value_len);
00166   }
00167 
00168   return cbuf;
00169 }

00171 
00172 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_close_request(uint64_t handle) {
00173   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, (uint32_t)((handle ^ (handle >> 32)) & 0x0FFFFFFFFLL));
00174   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 10);
00175   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_CLOSE);
00176   cbuf->append_i64(handle);
00177   return cbuf;
00178 }

00180 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_mkdir_request(const std::string &name) {
00181   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, filename_to_group(name));
00182   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + encoded_length_vstr(name.size()));
00183   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_MKDIR);
00184   cbuf->append_vstr(name);
00185   return cbuf;
00186 }

00198 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_attr_set_request(uint64_t handle, const std::string &name, const void *value, size_t value_len) {
00199   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, (uint32_t)((handle ^ (handle >> 32)) & 0x0FFFFFFFFLL));
00200   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 10 + encoded_length_vstr(name.size()) + encoded_length_vstr(value_len));
00201   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_ATTRSET);
00202   cbuf->append_i64(handle);
00203   cbuf->append_vstr(name);
00204   cbuf->append_vstr(value, value_len);
00205   return cbuf;
00206 }

00247 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_lock_request(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, bool try_lock) {
00248   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, (uint32_t)((handle ^ (handle >> 32)) & 0x0FFFFFFFFLL));
00249   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 15);
00250   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_LOCK);
00251   cbuf->append_i64(handle);
00252   cbuf->append_i32(mode);
00253   cbuf->append_byte(try_lock);
00254   return cbuf;
00255 }

00270 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_status_request() {
00271   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00272   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2);
00273   cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_STATUS);
00274   return cbuf;
